articles.title: Study finds nearly half of adult cancer deaths in US could be prevented: Here are lifestyle choices to change - ABC News
articles.description: Dr. Darien Sutton shares takeaways from a study by the American Cancer Society.
articles.content: Amid a rising number of cancer cases among adults in the United States, a new study has found that around 40% of all cases -- and nearly half of deaths -- could be prevented by making lifestyle chang… [+4988 chars]
